meanings.definition: A French game similar to lawn bowling.
meanings.sent1: We played boules in the park with friends.
meanings.sent2: The boules game requires skill and precision.
meanings.sent3: The boules rolled slowly towards the target.
meanings.sent4: Her aim in the boules game was as accurate as a sharpshooter.
meanings.sent5: The sound of boules hitting each other echoed in the quiet park.

meanings.definition: A set of metal balls used in the game of boules.
meanings.sent1: He bought a new set of boules for the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The boules gleamed in the sunlight as they were thrown.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog ran off with one of the boules.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the boules in his hand felt reassuring.
meanings.sent5: The clinking sound of the boules being carried in the bag was music to his ears.
